search.name: Sourceforge.net
search.description:
Search or go to open source projects on SourceForge.net.
Switches:
/cvs - Browse project's CVS repository
/exact - Require all words in when searching
/foundry - Goto a Sourceforge foundry
/freshmeat - Freshmeat.net
/list[:admin] - Display list info or admin page
/new - New Releases
/people - People
/project - Project's summary page
/software [default] - Software
Examples:
sf itext
sf itext java /exact
sf /proj dqsd
sf /cvs dqsd
sf /list dqsd-users
sf /fo java
